  • Method Details

    • getTilesToBuild

      public java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToBuild​(Tile tile)
      This method overrides Card.getTilesToBuild() Hestia's godpower allows her to build again but not on a perimetral tile. If we are performing the godpower, we simply remove the perimetral tiles returned as buildable by the general method. This action is actually performed in this.setTurnPhase since we need to check if there are any before taking action. Generate all possible builds from a starting Tile taking into account this Card rules of building.
      Specified by:
      getTilesToBuild in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      getTilesToBuild in class Card
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile where the worker is currently placed
      Returns:
      All possible tiles where the worker can build

    • useGodPower

      public void useGodPower​(boolean isUsed)
      Reacts to the player's manifest choice of using/not using this Card godpower. The specific actions done vary from card to card. Not all cards actually use this method.
      Specified by:
      useGodPower in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      useGodPower in class Card
      Parameters:
      isUsed - Indicates if the godpower will be used this turn.

    • setTurnPhase

      protected void setTurnPhase()
      This method overrides Card#setTurnPhase Computes and sets the next turn phase. This is called at the end of every phase-specific method. -> BUILD -> end if the player want to use Hestia's godpower -> GODPOWER - | -> end if the player doesn't want to use Hestia's godpower WORKERSELECTION -> MOVE -> BUILD - -> end if the player can't use Hestia's godpower
      Overrides:
      setTurnPhase in class Card
